title: Linux users Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux users command and learn how to manage user accounts, understand user privileges and permissions, and implement password policy and user management.

meta.title: Linux users Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux users command and learn how to manage user accounts, understand user privileges and permissions, and implement password policy and user management.
meta.keywords: Linux, users, user management, permissions, password policy, command line

verify.name: Verify user account creation
verify.hint: The user 'newuser' should have been created successfully.

verify.name: Verify user and group permissions
verify.hint: The user 'newuser' should have read, write, and execute permissions on the '/opt/myapp' directory.

steps.title: Implement Password Policy and User Management

verify.name: Verify password policy enforcement
verify.hint: The password policy should be enforced, and the user should not be able to set a weak password.
